title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 15 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 15 2022
description:
U.N. Secretary General warns of possible nuclear war. It's time for a negotiated settlement with Putin. Lindsey Graham wants no-fly zone if Russia uses chemical weapons. Oil price drops, no thanks to Biden. Democrats accuse Tucker Carlson of treason. Peter Doocy holds Psaki's feet to the fire. Nationwide crime wave: We've got a war going on in American cities.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
